channel.title: Milanjovanovic.tech on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Milanjovanovic.tech on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Service Discovery in Microservices With .NET and Consul
item.description: Service discovery is a pattern that allows developers to use logical names to refer to external services, instead of physical IP addresses and ports. In this week's issue, we'll see how to implement service discovery in your .NET microservices with Consul. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/service-discovery-in-microservices-with-net-and-consul

item.title: Flexible PDF Reporting in .NET Using Razor Views
item.description: In this article, we'll explore the power of using Razor views for flexible PDF reporting in .NET. We'll see how to create report templates with Razor views, convert them to HTML, and then transform that HTML into beautifully formatted PDF documents. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/flexible-pdf-reporting-in-net-using-razor-views
